tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_genre_preferences (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    music_genre VARCHAR(50),
    preferred_artist VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE music_listeners (
  listener_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  genre_preference VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE music_preferences (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    genre VARCHAR(20),
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE demographic_groups (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    group_name VARCHAR(50),
    group_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE genres (
  genre_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  genre_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  user_id INT,
  genre_id INT,
  rating INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, genre_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES demographics(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES genres(genre_id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  genre_id INT,
  activity_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES demographics(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES genres(genre_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Genres (
    genre_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    genre_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Songs (
    song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    song_name VARCHAR(100),
    artist_name VARCHAR(100),
    genre_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES Genres(genre_id)
)

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
    user_id INT,
    genre_id INT,
    preference_level INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, genre_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES Genres(genre_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Demographics (
    demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    age_group VARCHAR(20),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
)
